description: This file contains CSS rules and variables for theme management, defining styles for light and dark themes, as well as classes for the application layout, including header and button styles.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application wrapper with a centered layout and background color that changes based on the theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, styled to be flexible and centered.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link style for navigating within the application, also changes color based on the theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling the application's theme, with hover effects and responsive design.
